qas.question: What other areas has wrestling garnered interest from?
What areas of study is wrestling talked about in?

answers.text: an ethnography about the culture of lucha libre

qas.question: What college has a course about the cultural impact of wrestling?

context: With its growing popularity, professional wrestling has attracted attention as a subject of serious <a0_0>academic study and journalistic criticism<a0_0/>. Many courses, theses, essays, and dissertations have analyzed wrestling's conventions, content, and its role in modern society. It is often included as part of studies on <a1_0>theatre, sociology, performance, and media<a1_0/>. The <a3_0>Massachusetts Institute of Technology<a3_0/> developed a course of study on the cultural significance of professional wrestling, and anthropologist Heather Levi has written <a2_0>an ethnography about the culture of lucha libre<a2_0/> in Mexico.
